response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which holds immense value for you. I understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, and I am excited to offer it to you at an exclusive price tailored to make this opportunity even more appealing. Considering the unique benefits and exceptional quality of our product, I propose a special offer of $1,100,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a reduced cost. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1100000}
